data.title: Philosophy Timeline
data.text:
The history of philosophy timeline gives us a perspective of the movement as a whole. This is the backbone of Western civilization; it creates a conversation that reaches across 3000 years. The ideas of these thinkers develop in relation to the philosophers they are responding to. Books that reflect on the history of philosophy can give us further insights into the larger themes that run through the centuries. The following recommendations are starting points:

Terence Irwin (1989), A History of Western Philosophy: 1, Classical Thought, Oxford: Oxford University Press.

David Luscombe (1997), A History of Western Philosophy: vol 2, Medieval Thought, Oxford: Oxford University Press.

Brian P. Copenhaver and Charles B. Schmitt (1992), A History of Western Philosophy: 3, Renaissance Philosophy, Oxford: Oxford University Press.

John Cottingham (1988), A History of Western Philosophy: 4, The Rationalists, Oxford: Oxford University Press.

R. S. Woolhouse (1988), A History of Western Philosophy: 5, The Empiricists, Oxford: Oxford University Press.

John Skorupski (1993), A History of Western Philosophy: 6, English-Language Philosophy 1750-1945, Oxford: Oxford University Press.

Robert C. Solomon (1988), A History of Western Philosophy: 7, Continental Philosophy since 1750: The Rise and Fall of the Self, Oxford: Oxford University Press.

Thomas Baldwin (forthcoming), A History of Western Philosophy: 8, English-Language Philosophy since 1945, Oxford: Oxford University Press.

Copleston, F.C. A History of Philosophy, 9 vols[.

Creel, H.G. Chinese Thought: From Confucius To Mao Tse-tung.

Dasgupta, Surendranath. A History of Indian Philosophy, 5 vols.

Durant, Will. The Story of Philosophy.

Edwards, Paul. The Encyclopedia of Philosophy, 8 vols.

Hamilton, Edith. The Greek Way.

Hamlyn, D.W. A History of Western Philosophy.

Huxley, Julian. The Doubleday Pictorial Library of Growth of Ideas: Knowledge, Thought, Imagination.

Irwin, Terence. Classical Thought.

Randall, John Herman Jr. The Making of the Modern Mind.

Russell, Bertrand. The History of Western Philosophy.

Other Projects:

Trialectics ~ Metaphysics ~ Self and Society ~ Money and Truth ~ Logic, Math & Science ~ Psychology and Psychoanalysis ~ Spirituality and Religion ~ Art and Literature ~ Misc Quotes ~ Heterologies
